dc:title: We Know What Poverty Is
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the operation of the meal line and discusses the personal approach to poverty and the difference between destitution and poverty.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 128 1966-12-04 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
